sentences.sContent: Both of them come from Canada.
Canada and France should do the same.
sentences.sContent_eng: Canada and France should do the same.
sentences.sCn: 加拿大和法国也应该这样做。

sentences.sContent: If you do not mind, I may bring it back to you next time I go to Canada.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you do not mind, I may bring it back to you next time I go to Canada.
sentences.sCn: 如果你不介意的话，我也可以在下次去加拿大的时候把它给你带回去。
